alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 11:24PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Benton, northeastern Washington and eastern Delaware Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1123 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong outflow winds from thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of South West City to Gateway. These winds gusts will occur ahead of the thunderstorms. Movement was south at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Siloam Springs... Bella Vista... Lowell... Pea Ridge... Gentry... Tontitown... Gravette... Cave Springs... Decatur... West Siloam Springs... Colcord... Kansas... Highfill... Garfield... Gateway... Springtown... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 68 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
